name: Super Lunsford: Revengeance
description:
Use arrow keys to move

Up or Z to jump

You can slide along walls, and if you press jump while sliding you will perform a wall jump. This is very important!

Objective is to collect all 7 of the coins without dying.

Avoid the evil flying shadow clones.

Check out the source code:

https://github.com/TheTophatDemon/GDA-Nov-2021-Game-Jam
